name: TIME RUNNER (Rona Hattingh)
description:
After the bloody war between Organics and Machines, there reigned a time of "resignation". But something was coming to destroy whatever was left. Time was running out and you, a cyborg (organic and machine), have been created to deliver the message from the Oracle to the leaders of the Organics and Machines. 

Your journey will take you on a path  full of dangerous obstacles and murderous drones . Survive and deliver your message of Destruction and  Hope.

HOW TO PLAY?
  • Movement - WASD
  • Jump - SPACE
  • Shield Activation - Q
  • Pause Menu - ESC with RESET LEVEL BUTTON
CREDITS:

Thank you to every artist who contributed to the creation of this game.

TO THE PLAYER...

Like always, I hope you enjoy the game!

Lots of cyber love...

Rona Hattingh

Theme: "Time is running out."
